verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5085>Tiberias;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise<s%> <S%G5319>showed<s%> he himself.

There <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3674>together<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2580>Cana<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> sons of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> a <S%G232>fishing.<s%> They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4671>thee.<s%> They went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2117>immediately:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> they <S%G4084>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when the <S%G4405>morning<s%> was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G123>shore:<s%> <S%G3305>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Children, <S%G3813><s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> ye <S%G3387>any<s%> meat? <S%G4371><s%> They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3756>No.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G3313>side<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall find. <S%G2147><s%> They <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2089>now<s%> they were not <S%G2480>able<s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G1670>draw<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G3767>Now<s%> when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G1241>girt<s%> his fisher's <S%G1903>coat<s%> unto him, <S%G1063>(for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1131>naked,)<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> in a little <S%G4142>ship;<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G575>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4083>cubits,)<s%> <S%G4951>dragging<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1350>net<s%> with <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>

As soon then <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3767><s%> they were <S%G576>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1093>land,<s%> they <S%G991>saw<s%> a fire of <S%G439>coals<s%> <S%G2749>there,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3795>fish<s%> laid <S%G1945>thereon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye have <S%G3568>now<s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> went <S%G305>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1670>drew<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> a hundred and fifty and <S%G1540>three:<s%> <S%G4004><s%> <S%G5140><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for all there <S%G5607>were<s%> so <S%G5118>many,<s%> yet was <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1350>net<s%> <S%G4977>broken.<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> and dine. <S%G709><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5111>durst<s%> <S%G1833>ask<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4771>thou?<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>taketh<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> the third <S%G5154>time<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>showed<s%> himself to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> after that he was <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G709>dined,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jona,<s%> <S%G25>lovest<s%> thou <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than these? <S%G5130>He<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>Yea,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%> He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> lambs. <S%G721><s%>

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the second <S%G1208>time,<s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jona,<s%> <S%G25>lovest<s%> thou me? <S%G3165>He<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>Yea,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%> He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Feed <S%G4165><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> third <S%G5154>time,<s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of <S%G2495>Jona,<s%> <S%G5368>lovest<s%> thou me? <S%G3165><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> third <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G5368>Lovest<s%> thou <S%G3165>me?<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> all <S%G3956>things;<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

Verily, <S%G281><s%> <S%G281>verily,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G3753>When<s%> thou <S%G2258>wast<s%> <S%G3501>young,<s%> thou <S%G2224>girdedst<s%> <S%G4572>thyself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walkedst<s%> <S%G3699>whither<s%> thou wouldest: <S%G2309><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> thou shalt be <S%G1095>old,<s%> thou shalt stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> shall <S%G2224>gird<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>carry<s%> thee <S%G3699>whither<s%> thou <S%G2309>wouldest<s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G2036>spake<s%> he, <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he should <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> turning <S%G1994>about,<s%> <S%G991>seeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G190>following;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G377>leaned<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4738>breast<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1173>supper,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he that <S%G3860>betrayeth<s%> <S%G4571>thee?<s%>
Peter <S%G4074><s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall this <S%G3778>man<s%> do?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>tarry<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee?<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> went this saying <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> should <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G599>die:<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> He <S%G3754>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G599>die;<s%> <S%G235>but,<s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>tarry<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee?<s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> which <S%G3140>testifieth<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> these <S%G5023>things:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> <S%G3745>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> the <S%G3748>which,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they should be <S%G1125>written<s%> every <S%G2596>one,<s%> <S%G1520><s%> I <S%G3633>suppose<s%> that even <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> could <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G5562>contain<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G975>books<s%> that should be <S%G1125>written.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
